channel.title: Hello & Farewell
channel.description:
Hello... it‚Äôs me again... I‚Äôm back again with a message that you might understand.
The reason why I made this, is because I‚Äôve been suspended twice. Which means one more suspension & I‚Äôm disconnected from the forum, which means I‚Äôm gone.
My parents haven‚Äôt teached me some interactions quite yet & might not be ready to come back here today & do this.
I‚Äôve been making more & more progress on my beats however, yesterday I made this based off mvtts first drill beat for some reason. https://soundcloud.com/its_joshy/first-drill-beat-maybe
I also now have a perfect name that can fit the comeback, it‚Äôs called I T J. If anyone prefers it, like this comment if you agree!
I‚Äôm also one day from Day 100 on the forum, which could‚Äôve been July 13.
And from now on, I need to concentrate on: school, life & everything else that comes on my way. That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm taking a 6 month break.
On Happy New Years Eve, I‚Äôll come back one day early to see how you‚Äôve been doing & how your careers goin.
In the last topic, I told you that I have gotten sample packs that would help my career! Well this time, imma spill the links for your pleasure. Here are the sample pack creators that helped me on my career. (The sample packs they make are free btw) https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD3YMEecKKP_X7p243xeJqw https://www.youtube.com/user/ryandiedx
Well, this is goodbye now. I didn‚Äôt want this to end for me.
If you guys want to send me something like a sample pack, make sure to dm me.
See ya guys in 6 months. üò≠üò≠üò≠

The reason why I made this, is because I‚Äôve been suspended twice. Which means one more suspension & I‚Äôm disconnected from the forum, which means I‚Äôm gone.

On Happy New Years Eve, I‚Äôll come back one day early to see how you‚Äôve been doing & how your careers goin.
